recovery_key.title: Keep Recovery Key Carefully
recovery_key.description: Your recovery key is composed of randomly selected words. Please carefully write down each word in the order it appears.

recovery_key_warning.title: Warning
recovery_key_warning.description: Simply taking a screenshot of recovery phrase is not safe.

recovery_key_tips.title: Store recovery key safely
recovery_key_tips.description: Your recovery key is composed of randomly selected words. Please carefully write down each word in the order it appears.

wallet_create_success.title: Perfect!
wallet_create_success.description: In order to protect your funds against hackers and thieves, store this recovery phrase in a safe and secure place.

signout.title: Are you sure?
signout.description: Mask Network does not save any of your data. Please remember your account and password, and back up your data in time before your sign out.

set_password.title: Payment Password set up successfully!
set_password.description: You have successfully set up your payment password.

change_backup_password.title: Backup Password changed successfully!

identity_phrase.title: Identity Phrase
identity_phrase.description: Your identity phrase is composed of randomly selected words. Please carefully write down each word in the order it appears.

identify_code_screenshot_warning.title: Warning
identify_code_screenshot_warning.description: Simply taking a screenshot of identity code is not safe.

identity_create.title: Identity created!
identity_create.description: Please don’t forget your identity code. Your identity code is the only proof of your user identity and the only basis for you to encrypt or decrypt social activities.

persona_logout.title: Confirm to log out?
persona_logout.description: After logging out, your associated social accounts can no longer decrypt past encrypted messages.

persona_name_duplicated.title: The username has already been created.

setting.warning_backup_data_description: We have detected that you haven’t set up your backup password and/or payment password. Please set up your backup password and/or payment password before you back up.

disconnect_profile.title: Are you sure you want to disconnect the %s account of %s ? After disconnection, this account will no longer be able to decrypt and encrypt any information with Mask Network.

bind_remote_info.title: Internet or server problems
bind_remote_info.detail: Unable to verify because of internet connection or server problems. Please try again.

export_private_key.title: Set up backup password
export_private_key.description: Please set up your %s before you export private key.

backup_tips_no_backup_password.title: Set up backup password
backup_tips_no_backup_password.description: Please set up your %s before you back up.

permissions.title: Allow %s access

terms_of_service.description: Please review the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service of Mask Network.

biometry_id.passcode_notSet: Authentication could not start because passcode is not set on the device.
biometry_id.biometry_not_enrolled: Authentication could not start because %s has no enrolled identities.
biometry_id.biometry_lockout: Authentication was not successful because there were too many failed %s attempts and %s is now locked. Passcode is required to unlock %s.

biometry_id.biometry_has_changed: Your %s has been changed, %s will be closed

mnemonic_verify.description: Tap each word in the correct order.
mnemonic_verify.words_title: Tap each word in the correct order.
mnemonic_verify.mnemonic_prompt: Tap the middle to replace the word.

wallet_delete.title: Delete wallet
wallet_delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete this wallet? Your wallet cannot be recoverd without seed phrase.

wallet_backup.title: Back up wallet
wallet_backup.keystore_tips: Please remember your current payment password. Your current payment password is required for decryption when using the wallet Keystore for recovery.
wallet_backup.private_key_tips: One can use the private key to recover wallet account directly. Please do not let anyone else see the private key.

change_backup_password.tips: Backup password must be between 8 and 20 characters and contains at least a number, a uppercase letter, a lowercase letter and a special character.

app.riskwarning:
Dear User,

When using any wallet-related plugins in Mask Network, please confirm to accept the following usage risks:

Mask Network provides non-commercial free services. The plug-ins are provided by community members and other excellent third-party DApp teams. Due to the freedom of the decentralized network and other uncertain risk factors, users are requested to properly protect their sensitive information such as wallet mnemonic words and private keys. Please be cautious when conducting any blockchain contract interaction. The risks caused by any third-party DApps (plug-ins) are borne by the third-party DApps themselves.

Clicking the confirm button means that you agree to bear the above possible risks.

social.login_in_notify: Please log in to Twitter first and we will guide you through the next steps to connect to Mask Network.

social.connect_hint_logged_in: If you want to connect another account, please log out and log in with another account.
